name: CONSCRIPT Kickstarter Demo
description:
During the First World War, a lone French soldier must navigate twisted trenches, scavenge for limited supplies and solve complex puzzles - all whilst fighting for survival in the midst of mankind’s most brutal and horrifying conflict. CONSCRIPT is a new take on classic survival horror.

KICKSTARTER NOW LIVE:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/562623591/conscript-ww1-survival-horror

Conscript is a project I have been working on by myself for 3 years now. It was inspired by both my love of classic survival horror games and passion for history.

This demo contains around 40-60 minutes of gameplay from the trench area of the game. I hope you enjoy! If you know fans of classic survival horror, be sure to let them know about this project.

The game is still in alpha, so everything found in the demo is subject to change in the full release.

This demo is a Windows only build. The full release will support Mac and Linux. 

Thank you, and have fun, soldier!
